name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in developing high-performance backend solutions using **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Springboot**. My proficiency encompasses building and maintaining robust applications with **Postgres** and implementing CI/CD pipelines using tools like **CircleCI** and **Spinnaker**.  My background includes full-stack development with frameworks such as **React**, ensuring a seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems.
In addition to my technical skills, I bring a keen understanding of cloud services, having worked with platforms like Azure and AWS, and I have a proven track record in architecting microservices and event-driven systems. My focus on compliance and best practices is demonstrated by my experience aligning with standards such as HIPAA and SOC 2. Furthermore, I possess experience in machine learning pipelines, enhancing applications with AI capabilities, ensuring they are scalable and adaptable.
